name: Freelancer Invoice Template (2022)
description:
Hello 👋🏻


I’ve seen a lot of people without accountancy software using illustrator still for their invoices.


Use this, add it to your Figma project and remember to send it immediately after completion.


It's simple and clear, uses very little black ink when printed.


There’s also some official legal jargon in the terms for late payments I tend to use.


Pro-tip: Get 20-50% deposit up-front every time if you can.


I hope it’s useful.


Nick
